metadata.title: About Us | CFM LOGISTICS
metadata.description: Learn about CFM LOGISTICS and our mission to transform logistics in Mozambique

hero.subtitle: ABOUT US
hero.title: Who We Are
hero.description: Building the future of logistics in Mozambique with excellence and innovation

content.first: CFM LOGISTICS is a pioneer in integrated logistics solutions, combining century-old experience with innovation to meet transport and logistics demands in Mozambique.
content.second: Our commitment is to connect local resources to global markets, with efficient operations in maritime, rail and warehousing, promoting sustainable development.

content.first: CFM LOGISTICS was created to strengthen Mozambique's logistics infrastructure, focusing on transportation and the oil and gas industry. Established as a special purpose corporation, it is wholly owned by Mozambique Railways (CFM), benefiting from its vast railway and port experience.
content.second: With a modern and sustainable approach, CFM LOGISTICS positions itself as a strategic partner, ensuring efficiency, safety and competitiveness in logistics operations management.

mission.subtitle: OUR MISSION
mission.title: Connecting Resources
mission.description: To provide integrated and sustainable logistics solutions, connecting local resources to global markets, promoting Mozambique's economic and social development.

vision.subtitle: OUR VISION
vision.title: Reference in
vision.description: To be the reference in logistics and transportation in Africa, recognized for innovation, efficiency and positive impact on Mozambique's sustainable growth.

objectives.subtitle: STRATEGIC COMMITMENTS
objectives.title: Pillars of Action
objectives.description: Fundamental bases that guide our operational excellence

0.title: Logistics Infrastructure

1.description: Implement practices that reduce environmental impact and increase operational efficiency.

2.title: Energy Sector
2.description: Offer specialized and customized services to meet the needs of the energy sector.

3.title: Local Development
3.description: Create economic and social opportunities for Mozambicans, ensuring equitable distribution of wealth.

4.title: Operational Excellence
4.description: Maintain high standards of quality and safety in all logistics operations.

timeline.subtitle: OUR HISTORY
timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.description: A journey of excellence and innovation in Mozambican logistics

0.title: Official Launch of CFM Logistics
0.description: Historic milestone establishing a new era in Mozambican logistics, with the official launch of CFM Logistics, a company dedicated to revolutionizing the sector with integrated and innovative solutions.

1.title: Board of Directors and CEO Take Office
1.description: Significant moment with the appointment of strategic leadership, marking the beginning of management focused on operational excellence and sustainable development of the logistics sector.

2.title: Start of Port Operations in Pemba
2.description: Strategic expansion with the start of operations at the Port of Pemba, strengthening CFM Logistics' presence in the north of the country and expanding the region's logistics capacity.

3.title: Start of Maritime Operations in Nacala
3.description: Expansion of maritime operations to the Port of Nacala, consolidating CFM Logistics' presence in one of the country's main logistics corridors and reinforcing its capacity to meet international demands.

banner.title: Logistics that Transform.
banner.description: With century-old expertise, robust infrastructure and commitment to sustainability, CFM LOGISTICS connects Mozambique to the world and drives economic progress.

about.subtitle: ABOUT US
about.title: CFM LOGISTICS:
about.description: Connecting resources and opportunities, transforming Mozambique into a strategic logistics hub.

content.first: CFM LOGISTICS is a pioneer in integrated logistics solutions, combining tradition and innovation to drive Mozambique's economic development. With over a century of experience in rail, port and maritime sectors, the company leads operations connecting regional and global markets.
content.second: Focused on sustainability and efficiency, CFM LOGISTICS offers customized services to meet the demands of oil, gas and other strategic sectors. Our mission is to transform logistics challenges into opportunities, promoting economic and social progress.

introduction.subtitle: OUR EXPERTISE
introduction.title: Smart Logistics for
introduction.description: CFM LOGISTICS offers complete logistics solutions, designed to meet the needs of transportation, storage and cargo handling in various sectors. With robust infrastructure and century-old expertise, we connect local businesses to global markets, always with efficiency and commitment to sustainability.

0.title: Maritime and Rail Transport
0.description: With an extensive rail network and strategic ports, we ensure multimodal transport solutions that reduce costs and increase efficiency in cargo movement.
highlights: Connectivity between ports, railways and roads
Safe transport of heavy cargo and bulk

1.title: Storage and Integrated Logistics
1.description: Our storage terminals offer modern infrastructure to ensure safety, efficiency and total control over cargo handling.
highlights: Integrated management to optimize costs and time

2.title: Oil and Gas Services
2.description: With expertise in the energy sector, we handle logistics operations for transportation, storage and handling of oil and gas derivatives.

3.title: Logistics Project Management
3.description: We offer consulting and execution of customized logistics projects, helping companies optimize operations and reduce costs.

0.description: State-of-the-art ports, railways and storage to meet all logistics needs.

1.description: Over 100 years of logistics expertise, building the history of transportation in Mozambique.

2.description: Commitment to sustainable practices and innovative solutions for the future of logistics.

3.title: Guaranteed Safety
3.description: Rigorous safety standards in all transport and storage operations.
